sentences.english: Once upon a barren moor there dwelt a bear, also a boar.
sentences.chinese: 從前，在一個貧瘠的荒野裏住了一隻熊和一隻公野豬。

sentences.english: Supporting the Razorback football team was central to the idea of being an Arkansan.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個阿肯色州人，核心概念就是要支持野豬隊。

sentences.english: He jabbed at the wild boar with his bayonet.
sentences.chinese: 他用刺刀猛刺那頭野豬。

sentences.english: A soldier in a chariot will resist the Wolf and transform the Cornish people into a Boar.
sentences.chinese: 戰車上的士兵會抵抗狼，把康沃爾人變成野豬。

sentences.english: Buha by wild boar to the top of the back, which is what it expected.
sentences.chinese: 布哈依被野豬頂到了背上，這正是它所期待的。

sentences.english: Hunting wild-pig in North District, Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 大埔野豬隊在新界北區的獵豬行動。

sentences.english: I kept thinking, has come to a wild boar by Buha hole.
sentences.chinese: 想着想着，布哈依已經來到了野豬洞。

sentences.english: Wild boar estrus none seasonally and mate all the year.
sentences.chinese: 公野豬發情無季節性，可以常年配種。

sentences.english: The latter, as if he had seen his intention, turned towards Durward with mace uplifted;
sentences.chinese: 那“野豬”似乎看清了他的意圖，便舉起鐵杖迎戰。

sentences.english: Once upon a barren moor here dwelt a bear, too a boar.
sentences.chinese: 從前，在一個貧瘠的荒野裏住了一隻熊和一隻公野豬。

sentences.english: That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able. Bores ruin a party. Boars are party to ruin.
sentences.chinese: 該生物此回合若可阻擋衝撞公野豬，則須阻擋之。

sentences.english: Hybrid swines of wild boars crossed with domestic pigs have the normal reproductive capacity.
sentences.chinese: 野豬與家豬雜交能夠產生具有正常繁殖力的後代。

sentences.english: Immature basilisks usually stand as tall and wide as an adult boar.
sentences.chinese: 未成年的蜥怪站起來大約有一頭成年野豬般大小。

sentences.english: This Lion will trample the Boar under foot and terrify it with its open maw.
sentences.chinese: 獅子會用足底踩踏野豬，用張開的胃恐嚇它。

sentences.english: And you must stay for our luau later tonight.
sentences.chinese: 你們兩個一定要留下來參加今晚的烤野豬宴會。

sentences.english: Bear and wild boars range through the forests all day long.
sentences.chinese: 熊和野豬整天在森林中來回跑動。

definition: to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)
to run away/to flee in disarray
to shoot dead (with a gun, or bow and arrow)
